document_data.name: Baralea Braceryn
document_data.refs3e: {{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|28-29}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 23: Cheap and Cheerful at the Three Elves}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''Baralea Braceryn''' was part-owner, cook, and hostess at the [[Three Elves]] inn in [[Voonlar]] ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]].
__NOTOC__
document_data.Description: She was rotund, but with bird-like quickness.
document_data.Personality: Baralea was flirtatious and bustled about, thoughtfully taking care of her customer's needs.
document_data.Abilities: She was a great cook, able to quickly whip up a meal. She and her sister brewed a sweet beer from berries.
document_data.Relationships: The Three Elves was a very popular inn throughout the Moonsea region and its owner/operators were highly regarded. Baralea had a  sister, [[Ammatha Braceryn|Ammatha]].
